abstract: Burkina Faso security minister says its forces foiled plans for major attack ahead of national elections.
lead_paragraph: Security forces arrested 13 people and seized weapons and bomb-making materials near the border with Mali,

headline.main: Burkina Faso: Authorities Claim to Disrupt a ‘Large-Scale Attack’
headline.print_headline: Africa; Burkina Faso: Authorities Claim to Disrupt a ‘Large-Scale Attack’

snippet: Security forces arrested 13 people and seized weapons and bomb-making materials near the border with Mali,
